testsuite.name: JsonDatabaseTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #2
When a client tries to get an empty cell from the server, the server should send 'ERROR' as response and the client should print that response
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test.
---
Arguments for Main: -t get -i 1
Server started! Client started! Sent: Give me a record of # 12 Received: Give me a record of # 12 Sent: A record # 12 was sent! Received: A record # 12 was sent!
